Joe realized he didn't know her name. "It's Jamie" the girl replied smiling. "The Skunk is over there." Joe said "I'm trying to stop her before she causes anymore trouble."

Jamie frowned "The Skunk? That bitch is over here stinking up my turf?" she shook her head. "Always thought she was better than me."

Joe paled...."Wait are you....with her?" he gulped. Jamie giggled. "Oh no, I'm not a skunk if that's what your worried about." Jamie flipped her skirt up much to Joe's surprise. Her curvy bottom was actually red and kind of bug like although in a way that was still attractive. "They call me the Stink Bug. I've been rivals with the Skunk for awhile now." Jamie frowned. "She thinks that because she can stink faster than me she's better. But I say in the end I can blow her out of the water. Watch." Jamie bit her lip and started to look strained. "Urrrrggh" Her belly started to gurgle and her butt seemed to actually swell up a little.

Joe quickly cut her off. "Um this isn't really the time, now." Jamie stopped. "Oh" she giggled. "Yeah I guess not, sorry but when I think of how she wants to show me up it always makes me steamed." Joe thought to himself. Maybe this girl would be helpful. "Look Jamie, the Skunk is over there right now gassing some poor guy and I plan to make her stop. Wanna help me out?"

Jamie looked at him suddenly looking evil....
143.title: Stinky Rivalry.
